rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open foyer that welcomes visitors with an inviting space. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the entrance along the South-West direction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen and central courtyard for a harmonious flow of energy. The design supports family gatherings with ample seating space.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, functional, open-plan kitchen integrated within the living area. Vastu guidelines are followed by placing it in the Southeastern part to promote positivity and health.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen-living space with flexible seating arrangements that encourage communal meals.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom designed for privacy and comfort. Oriented towards a quieter zone of the house (North) in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Connected to the primary bedroom, ensuring convenience while maintaining privacy. Sized appropriately per building norms.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open central courtyard integrated within the floor plan for natural light and ventilation, serving as a communal space for family activities and relaxation.

openings.description: Provides entry into the house aligning with Vastu's recommendation for openings along this direction to invite positive energy.
